message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good chunk.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to go.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  My last offer was generous, but I'm willing to compromise a little more.  Time is running out!
Alice, I'm willing to take a bit less to get this done. This is a fair compromise, considering the time we're losing.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats up all your potential winnings!
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer. Let's get this done before we lose everything.
Bob, I'm offering you a lifeline!  Take this and get something out of this game!
Alice, this is it! This is my last offer. If you reject it, we both get nothing.  Take it and let's end this.
